categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: During the Mission to Tazan, "Hamzad Clines" was an alias used by a Human member of the Rebel Alliance to contact the Rebel sympathizer Willer Clines at his home on the planet Tazan. As part of the cover story, "Hamzad Clines" had lived on Alderaan, but was not there when it was destroyed by the Death Star, and was looking for any relatives that had escaped the destruction as well.
